snippet: Revenue was slightly lower as print advertising fell, but the decline was offset by growth in digital advertising and cost cuts.
abstract: New York Times Co reports second-quarter net income of more than $16 million on revenue of about $383 million, down 1.5 percent from roughly $389 million one year earlier; reports net addition of 33,000 digital subscribers in period after disclosing that it has surpassed one million total subscribers for the first time.
lead_paragraph: Revenue was slightly lower as print advertising fell, but the decline was offset by growth in digital advertising and cost cuts.

headline.main: New York Times Co. Reports $16 Million Profit
headline.print_headline: New York Times Co. Reports Profit and Digital Growth
